originContent: A collection of modifications, enhancements, and reverse engineered resources for Creation Kit by Bethesda.
translatedContent: 베데스다의 Creation Kit를 위한 수정, 개선 및 리버스 엔지니어링된 리소스 모음입니다.

originContent: **CKPE** a shared source powerful platform makes numerous fixes and improvements to the Creation Kit editor from **Bethesda**, includes editor support for games such as **Skyrim Special Edition**, **Fallout 4**, **Starfield**, is a successor to the [SSE CKFixes](https://github.com/Nukem9/skyrimse-test), [SSE CKFixes Update](https://github.com/Perchik71/SkyrimSETest), [FO4 CKFixes](https://github.com/Perchik71/Fallout4Test) projects, also [Unicode patch for SSE CK 1.5.73](https://github.com/Perchik71/usse_test) which started it all for the author of **perchik71**.
translatedContent: **CKPE**는 공유 소스의 강력한 플랫폼으로, 베데스다의 Creation Kit 편집기에 수많은 수정 및 개선을 제공하며, **Skyrim Special Edition**, **Fallout 4**, **Starfield**와 같은 게임 편집기 지원을 포함하고, [SSE CKFixes](https://github.com/Nukem9/skyrimse-test), [SSE CKFixes Update](https://github.com/Perchik71/SkyrimSETest), [FO4 CKFixes](https://github.com/Perchik71/Fallout4Test) 프로젝트의 후속작이며, 작성자 **perchik71**가 시작한 [SSE CK 1.5.73용 유니코드 패치](https://github.com/Perchik71/usse_test)도 포함합니다.

originContent: Download any [supported game](https://github.com/Perchik71/Creation-Kit-Platform-Extended/wiki#brief) and install Creation Kit.
translatedContent: 지원되는 [게임](https://github.com/Perchik71/Creation-Kit-Platform-Extended/wiki#brief) 중 하나를 다운로드하고 Creation Kit를 설치하세요.

originContent: Extract all contents into game directory, so that **ckpe_loader.exe** is in the same folder as **CreationKit.exe**.
translatedContent: 모든 내용을 게임 디렉터리에 압축 해제하여 **ckpe_loader.exe**가 **CreationKit.exe**와 동일 폴더에 있도록 하세요.

originContent: Extract all contents into game directory, so that **ckpe_loader.exe** is in the same folder as **CreationKit.exe**.
translatedContent: 모든 내용을 게임 디렉터리에 압축 해제하여 **ckpe_loader.exe**가 **CreationKit.exe**와 동일 폴더에 있도록 하세요.

originContent: Regular users only need this method to access the newest features which haven't been released yet.
translatedContent: 일반 사용자는 아직 릴리스되지 않은 최신 기능에 접근하기 위해 이 방법만 필요합니다.

originContent: Open a project in **`Visual Studio 2022`** or later. Build the project in **`Release`** mode or **`Release-NoAVX2`**.
translatedContent: **`Visual Studio 2022`** 이상에서 프로젝트를 열고, **`Release`** 모드 또는 **`Release-NoAVX2`**로 빌드하세요.

originContent: Then move your build output into game directory, so that **ckpe_loader.exe** is in the same folder as **CreationKit.exe**.
translatedContent: 그런 다음 빌드 출력물을 게임 디렉터리에 이동하여 **ckpe_loader.exe**가 **CreationKit.exe**와 동일 폴더에 있도록 하세요.

originContent: If you are asked to replace old files agree to replace all.
translatedContent: 이전 파일 교체 요청 시 모두 교체에 동의하세요.

originContent: Download [latest commit build](https://github.com/Perchik71/Creation-Kit-Platform-Extended/actions) of **CKPE** for your game.
Extract all contents into game directory, so that **ckpe_loader.exe** is in the same folder as **CreationKit.exe**.
translatedContent: 모든 내용을 게임 디렉터리에 압축 해제하여 **ckpe_loader.exe**가 **CreationKit.exe**와 동일 폴더에 있도록 하세요.

originContent: [Nukem9](https://github.com/Nukem9) (for experimental functions, hash and so on, very useful)
translatedContent: [Nukem9](https://github.com/Nukem9) (실험적 기능, 해시 등 매우 유용한 기능 제공)

originContent: [adzm](https://github.com/adzm) (I really appreciate your work, you have [done](https://github.com/adzm/win32-custom-menubar-aero-theme) what I have long wanted to do myself)
translatedContent: [adzm](https://github.com/adzm) (정말 감사드립니다, 제가 오래도록 직접 하고 싶었던 일을 [완성](https://github.com/adzm/win32-custom-menubar-aero-theme)하셨습니다)

originContent: [yak3d](https://github.com/yak3d) (For the contribution and development of workflow and support newest Starfield)
translatedContent: [yak3d](https://github.com/yak3d) (워크플로우 기여 및 최신 Starfield 지원 개발)

File `Stuffs\FO4\CreationKitPlatformExtended_FO4_Resources.pak` contains proprietary and not licensed files; the same applies to files in `d3dcompiler\*.*`.
translatedContent: `Stuffs\FO4\CreationKitPlatformExtended_FO4_Resources.pak` 파일은 독점적이며 라이선스가 없는 파일을 포함하며, `d3dcompiler\*.*` 파일에도 동일하게 적용됩니다.

originContent: Dependencies are under their respective licenses.
